name: Nectevia® Madagascar Vanilla - Stevia Infused Agave Nectar
description: Nectevia® Madagascar Vanilla - Stevia Infused Agave Nectar infuses organic blue agave nectar with premium 100% pure stevia extract creates a decadent, indulgent taste experience with only 1/4 the calories, carbs and sugars of regular agave, or table sugar. The sweet richness of natural vanilla in Nectevia. Enjoy subtly seductive, sweet, cream flavor and the richness of natural vanilla in delectable Nectevia agave. 75% fewer carbs, calories and sugars, compared to regular agave, Nectevia provides an amazing 200 servings per bottle. Super concentrated, it lasts 400% longer than regular agave. 1 tsp Nectevia = 4 tsp regular agave, which means one bottle of Nectevia is like buying an astonishing 4 bottles of regular agave.
